VEC.Q: How many lines are in this lines chart?

SRP.Q: On Free Users, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1955 relative to that in 1953 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Free Users, the data point in 1955 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1953.

SRP.Q: In 1958, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Casual Users relative to Heavy Users?
SRP.A: In 1958, Casual Users is {below} Heavy Users in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Mobile Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: Mobile Users's average watch time levels show a {stable falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Premium Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: Premium Users's average watch time levels show a {stable rising} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Casual Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: Casual Users's average watch time levels show a {exponential rising} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Free Users's Average Watch Time levels?
VPR.A: Free Users's average watch time levels show a {periodic stable} trend.

VE.Q: What is Premium Users's Average Watch Time in 1954?
VE.A: Premium Users's average watch time in 1954 is {41.86} minutes.

VE.Q: What is Premium Users's Average Watch Time in 1950?
VE.A: Premium Users's average watch time in 1950 is {35.31} minutes.

VE.Q: What is Casual Users's Average Watch Time in 1960?
VE.A: Casual Users's average watch time in 1960 is {42.33} minutes.

VE.Q: What are the average watch time of Premium Users, Casual Users, and Free Users in 1953?
VE.A: Premium Users's average watch time is {40.36} minutes, Casual Users's average watch time is {21.70} minutes, Free Users's average watch time is {27.66} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Average Watch Time in the line chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum average watch time is {16.53} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Average Watch Time in the line chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum average watch time is {99.25} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Average Watch Time level recorded for Casual Users?
EVJ.A: Casual Users reached approximately {99.25} minutes in {1969}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Average Watch Time level recorded for Casual Users?
EVJ.A: Casual Users's lowest recorded level is approximately {16.53} minutes in {1950}.

SC.Q: What is the rate of change in Free Users's Average Watch Time from the starting year to the final year?
SC.A: The rate of decline in Free Users's average watch time is {-25.19}%.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Desktop Users's Average Watch Time?
SC.A: The average value of Desktop Users's average watch time is {40.65} minutes.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Free Users's Average Watch Time?

SC.Q: What is the average value of Mobile Users's Average Watch Time?

NF.Q: In the year 1968, which lines had Average Watch Time below 55 minutes? Please list the lines and corresponding values.
NF.A: {Mobile Users} had {55} minutes, {Free Users} had {28} minutes.

NF.Q: Which years did Casual Users's Average Watch Time between 29 and 60 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {31.48} minutes in {1957} year, {38.31} minutes in {1959} year, {42.33} minutes in {1960} year.

NF.Q: Which years did Heavy Users's Average Watch Time exceed 59 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding values.
NF.A: {65.45} minutes in {1960} year, {65.47} minutes in {1963} year, {59.54} minutes in {1953} year.

NF.Q: In the year 1962, which lines had Average Watch Time between 47 and 53 minutes? Please list the lines and corresponding values.
NF.A: {Mobile Users} had {48} minutes, {Casual Users} had {51} minutes.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1964, which line had a higher average Average Watch Time, Casual Users or Mobile Users?
NC.A: {Mobile Users} had a higher average average watch time.

NC.Q: Was Mobile Users's Average Watch Time in 1954 higher or lower than in 1965?
NC.A: The average watch time in 1954 was {lower} than in 1965.

NC.Q: Between 1953 and 1961, which line experienced the largest change in Average Watch Time, Desktop Users, Heavy Users, or Free Users?
NC.A: {Desktop Users} experienced the largest change in average watch time.

NC.Q: Was Mobile Users's Average Watch Time in 1955 higher or lower than in 1958?
NC.A: The average watch time in 1955 was {lower} than in 1958.

MSR.Q: Which label shows the largest fluctuation in the line chart?
MSR.A: The label with the largest fluctuation is {Casual Users}.

MSR.Q: Which line shows the fastest average growth rate between 1953 and 1964?
MSR.A: {Casual Users} has the fastest average growth rate between 1953 and 1964.

MSR.Q: In which year did Casual Users first surpass Mobile Users?
MSR.A: Casual Users first surpassed Mobile Users in the year {1962}.

MSR.Q: Which label had the leading average watch time since 1966?
MSR.A: Since 1966, {Casual Users} had the leading average watch time.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Heavy Users. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(6 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1950, 1954, 1957, 1963, 1966, 1969}.
